job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Title:&nbsp;Software Engineer- Wallets team</strong></p><p><strong>Location: Remote</strong></p><p><strong>Duration: PERM</strong></p><p><strong><u>Job Description:</u></strong></p><p><strong><u>What you'll work on:</u></strong></p><ul><li>Design and develop resilient and scalable solutions that receive, custody, and broadcast digital assets for millions of users across all major blockchain networks</li><li>Work on critical, high-value software for the client crypto currency exchange</li><li>Solve complex problems unique to the crypto currency space that use applied cryptography and strict security protocols</li><li>Work with modern, state-of-the-art software development, including CI/CD, infrastructure as code, containers, and microservices architecture</li><li>Work with a diverse set of languages and frameworks, including Java microservices, TypeScript, Python, a suite of AWS services, and various databases</li><li>Mentor and train other engineers using your expertise in software development</li><li>Be an integral member of an agile software engineering team using SCRUM methodology</li></ul><p><strong><u>What you'll bring:</u></strong></p><ul><li>5+ years designing software and coding professionally</li><li>Computer Science degree preferred</li><li>An interest in the blockchain and cryptocurrency space</li><li>Proficient with Java</li><li>Proficient with a scripting language such as Python, Nodejs and/or PHP</li><li>Comfortable and proficient in a Linux terminal is required</li><li>Experience building and testing microservices with REST, preferably in Java</li><li>Capable of taking a new feature from the software design stage, through the development process, and ship it to production</li><li>Broad knowledge of SQL and relational database design</li><li>Some knowledge of the mechanics of applied cryptography including hashing, randomization, public-key encryption, symmetric encryption, and elliptic curves</li><li>An eye for detail</li><li>Strong communication skills with the ability to explain complex problems and concepts to people of all levels of expertise</li><li>A passion for learning and sharing what you learn</li><li>Comfort and experience shifting gears quickly, learning on the fly, and working on an evolving product without having all of the answers</li></ul><li><br></li>
